You guys should try dota. Honestly i played leauge for about 2 years and got to plat and i realized that i was stuck playing the "meta" and permabanning the same champs over and over literally using only about 10 of the 15 viable heros at the time. Also the itemization roles and lanes were the same as well everygame so it got stale eventually and it will for you too just give it time. I used to rip on dota all the time but i gave it a shot and after seeing that its actually more in depth and no games are the same everyone is unique. Sacrifice means one person loses and one person wins. Look for win-win solutionsLevel 1:There are some easy win-win scenarios. Drive a bit further down the road and go to both drive-thrus. Then eat in a park or at home. Both people eat what they want. Or take turns deciding where to eat.Level 2 and up :Assuming you've been together for a while, like at least a year, and it's serious, then you should already be making plans that suit both people. One person can't just say "We have to move to city X". No single person is in control. Once you get to that level of commitment you have to look at it for what is best for the partnership. What's best for the group? It should never be one person's will over another. This is different to sacrifice.
